title: Terms may be changed any time at their discretion, without notice to the user

tosdr.case: Terms may be changed any time at their discretion, without notice to the user
tosdr.tldr: As stated in the Privacy Policy: "This policy may change from time to time and, if it does, the up-to-date version will always be available on the Virgin.com site. Please make sure that you are aware of the latest version of this Privacy Policy."
